paper.title: Inference methods based on extended dempster & Shafer’s theory for problems with uncertainty/fuzziness

author.org: Institute of Industrial Science, the University of Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan.

paper.abstract: In the reduction of problems with uncertainty, combination relation called COMB becomes important as well as AND/OR relations. Dempster u0026 Shafer’s theory provides a rational inference mechanism for the COMB relation. Knowledge often manifests fuzziness as well as uncertainty. To construct expert systems utilizing such knowledge, Dempster u0026 Shafer’s theory is extended in two ways to include fuzzy subset and fuzzy certainty.
